name: Singapore Airlines Business Class A380: SQ Part 3
description:
Time for some serious luxury: Business Class on Singapore Airlines A380.  So how good is it?  Watch this review to find out.  

This flight review video is Episode 3 of my series The 4 Classes of Singapore Airlines.   Check them all out by clicking on my channel below....and of course please don't forget to subscribe. 

The other episodes are:

Ep 1: Singapore Airlines Economy Class:   https://youtu.be/cMR8v4K7ugg 
Ep 2: Singapore Airlines Premium Economy Class:  https://youtu.be/iuJEP9s9UAU  
Ep 4: Singapore Airlines First Class Suites:  https://youtu.be/yNoNrAXS38I 

This is part 3 of my four part flight review series on Singapore Airlines.  It covers my flight from Zurich to Singapore on SQ345 on the Airbus A380.

This flight review video covers Zurich Airport, the Swiss Air business class lounge, boarding and the Singapore Airlines business class pod-sytle seats.  Once in your seat the famous Singapore Airlines onboard service starts with a glass of champagne followed by endless drinks and inflight meals.  When it's time for sleeping the business class seat coverts into a fully flat bed.  I also cover the entertainment system, onboard ammentities and the wonderful SilverKris Lounge at Singapore's Changi Airport.  

For more flight review videos including Emirates, Qantas, Qatar, LATAM, Turkish Airlines, Air Baltic and Cathay Pacific please visit my channel DennisBunnik Travels.  

Camera:  Sony DHR-PJ790
Flight:  SQ345
Airline:  Singapore Airlines
Route:  Zurich to Singapore
Aircraft:  Airbus A380-800
Aircraft Reg: 9VSKE
Seat:  26A (window)
